title: Vaccination of influenza a virus decreases transmission rates in pigs
text:
The lung lesions of the heterologous vaccine treatment pigs were highly variable ranging from absent to severe
 The lung lesions of the homologous vaccine treatment pigs were absent to minimal
 Subclinical infections with virus shedding can occur in vaccinated animals, particularly when there is a mismatch between the vaccine and field virus strains [12, 53]
authors: Romagosa, Anna; Allerson, Matt; Gramer, Marie; Joo, Han Soo; Deen, John; Detmer, Susan; Torremorell, Montserrat
